trends: There have been no other sightings in Montpelier
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailson my porch at approx. 10 pm just enjoying a night breeze with my cousin, i glanced up and seen an object come out of the sky directy north of my hose, it hovered for apprx. 1-2 min. the proceded east at a slow speed, the the sight picture got smaller and smaller until gone, 45 min later another apperead same color, shape..ect was worried that it had deteced us, after the second one was seen, proceded to get my shotgun
Summary: thought it was a meteor until it hovered
